widget_subtitle: Search fashion facilities to find out which brands they supply and what data is available about workforce composition, average wages and living wage gaps.
public_commitment_question: Public Commitment on Living Wage: Has this brand made a public commitment to pay all workers in its supply chain a living wage sufficient to support themselves and their dependents?
public_commitment_note: Public Commitment on Living Wage: Has this brand made a public commitment to pay all workers in its supply chain a living wage sufficient to support themselves and their dependents?
about_p1: The Fashion Facility Checker is part of the Fashion Checker - a Clean Clothes Campaign project which shines a light on wages in apparel supply chains.
about_p2: The Facility Checker is completely free and open for anyone to use.
about_p3: Users can search and discover what information is available about wages, living wage gaps, workforce composition and supply chain relationships in apparel facilities.
about_p4: The data in this tool is available on the Wikirate platform under a Creative Commons - Attribution 4.0 International License. The tool includes data collected by Clean Clothes Campaign, Fashion Revolution, the Open Apparel Registry and Wikirate.
about_p5: The Facility Checker has been developed and is maintained by Wikirate. The search interface can be embedded on external websites using this link.
about_p6: Have questions about the tool? Get in touch.
